lt {
    Version{ "2.0" }
    collations {
      standard { 
        Version { "2.0" }
        Sequence { 
            "&\u0328 << \u0307" // put dot-above after ogonek
            "&[before 1]D<č<<<Č"
            "&[before 1]J<y<<<Y"
            "&[before 1]T<š<<<Š"
            "&[before 1]Ʒ<ž<<<Ž"
            // sources differ on the following, and the strengths thereof
            // so keep in file but leave commented out
            // "&C<<ch<<<Ch<<<CH"
            // "&H<ch<<<Ch<<<CH"
            // "&[before 1]B<ą<<<Ą"
            // "&[before 1]F<ę<<<Ę<ė<<<Ė"
            // "&[before 1]I<į<<<Į"
            // "&[before 1]V<ų<<<Ų<ū<<<Ū"
        }
      }
    }
}
